text: The provisions of this chapter are not exclusive, and the remedies provided for shall be in addition to any other remedies provided for in any other law or available pursuant to common law.

Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 2-381.06

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Remedies pursuant to other laws; severability of provisions; liberality of article construction.
